metadata.Title: CVE-2010-4005 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The (1) tomboy and (2) tomboy-panel scripts in GNOME Tomboy 1.5.2 andearlier place a zero-length directory name in the LD_LIBRARY_PATH, whichallows local users to gain privileges via a Trojan horse shared library inthe current working directory.  NOTE: vector 1 exists because of anincorrect fix for CVE-2005-4790.2.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2010-4005` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tomboy - 1.15.4-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tomboy package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.15.4-0ubuntu1').
